name: UDJ01InputConfig
doc:
UDJ01InputConfig

     Non-mutable data asset that contains input configuration properties.

NativeInputActions: List of input actions used by the owner.  These input actions are mapped to a gameplay tag and must be manually bound.
AbilityInputActions: List of input actions used by the owner.  These input actions are mapped to a gameplay tag and are automatically bound to abilities with matching input tags.
